entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MessagePack deserialization throws error when using Lz4BlockArray compression #46787
  • Support inferring parameters bound from JSON body or service #46786
    8.0-preview3
  • Support parameters bound from an array of types in RequestDelegateGenerator #46785
    8.0-preview3
  • net::ERR_CONTENT_LENGTH_MISMATCH 200 (OK) #46784
  • Increase timeout for project template tests to an hour #46782
    8.0-preview2
  • SpaProxy should not inject middleware with ASPNETCORE_HOSTINGSTARTUPASSEMBLIES #46780
  • ObjectDisposedException thrown on server shutdown due to disposed MemoryCache #46779
  • Kestrel server returns 500 status code (instead of 400) if client corrupts TLS encrypted data #46778
  • The "ComplexObjectModelBinder" instead of the "ComplexTypeModelBinder" class access type change issue #46775
  • .net 7 signalr Default authenticationSchemes not working #46774
  • Support F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46773
    Backlog
  • Improve HttpResponse.OnCompleted and RegisterForDispose XML docs #46772

Closed

  • Analyzer to detect greater than 1 [FromBody] usage #45382
    8.0-preview2
  • [AOT] Add safe route value overloads to `Results` and `TypeResults` #46229
    8.0-preview2
  • Add RouteValueDictionary overloads to Http.Results #46542
    8.0-preview2
  • Support parameter binding for body or service parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #46337
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor component events not trigger in MVC partial view when calling via javascript #46663
  • [RDG] Optimize how EndpointFilterInvocationContext type is generated #46640
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor IJSRuntime.Invoke memory leak problem #46761
  • Identity schema versioning design / infrastructure #46274
    8.0-preview2
  • CheckSlidingExpiration is not called when using your own CookieAuthenticationEvents implementation #46776
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor WebAssembly loading screen shows 101% loaded #46770
    8.0-preview2
  • AddRoutingCore(this IServiceCollection services) and RouteOptions updates for CreateSlimBuilder #46428
    8.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Bump template tests timeout #46783
    area-mvc, tell-mode, test-fixed, 6.0.x
  • Avoid more UnobservedTaskExceptions in SignalR .NET client #46781
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Greater than 1 FromBody analyzer. #46494
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • [AOT] Add Http.Results RouteValueDictionary overloads #46594
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • CheckSlidingExpiration should use Events property #46777
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `376a7f3` to `a2880db` #46763
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b73f27f` to `7a7231c` #46762
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46716
    area-runtime
  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46687
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0.x
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #46769
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Prevent NRE when body is not set #46564
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Prevent NRE when body is not set #46613
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Templates.Blazor.Tests: skip Playwright based tests when Playwright is not available. #46760
    area-blazor, community-contribution
